kenticocommunity.qandaanswerdata.QAndAAnswerDataContent:
I’m pleased to see MFA has been released! 👏
We've been advocating for this feature since we enable it on all our projects and applications. Now we can add Xperience by Kentico to our list of applications that support it! 🔐
⚠ Just a word of caution: if you're trying to set it up today (v29.6.0 or v29.6.1), there’s currently a bug that requires MFA to be enabled on your presentation website, even if you don’t have authentication set up. This issue is being addressed by Kentico Support, and I look forward to testing it again once it’s fixed.
